name: Crooked Fang-4fr
flavor_text: I sink my teeth into my prey.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Dual strength barrel.

perks.name: Smallbore
